'; } else { console.log('Not found output element, are you sure you this is not safelink page ??'); } } }); Convert Password Random Post Countdown Encrypt Make your url unreadable and no one can bypass Password Set a password to protect your links from unauthorized access Setting Easy to setting without need to know programming language "use strict"; $(document).ready(function() { config.countdown ? $('#countDown').prop('checked', true) : $('#countDown').prop('checked', false) ; $('#randPost').prop('checked', true); $('#passbtn').on('click', function(e) { var $this = $(this); if($this.hasClass('btn-dark')){ $this.removeClass('btn-dark').addClass('btn-primary'); $('#passinput').removeAttr('disabled'); } else { $this.removeClass('btn-success').addClass('btn-dark'); $('#passinput').attr('disabled', 'disabled')[0].value = ''; } e.preventDefault(); }); $('#safelink').on('submit', function(e) { e.preventDefault(); var $this = $(this), passinput = $('#passinput')[0], keyit = passinput.value.length ? passinput.value : config.defaultkey, blog = config.url.length ? config.url : window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.hostname, url = $this.find('#urlinput')[0], randPost = $('#randPost')[0], result = $('#result')[0], data = {}; data.url = url.value, data.countdown = $('#countDown')[0].checked; if (url.value.length) { if (randPost.checked) { if (validurlit(url.value)) { $.ajax({ url: '/feeds/posts/summary?alt=json&max-results=99', type: 'GET', dataType: 'json', cache: true, beforeSend: function() { result.innerHTML = '

'; } setTimeout(function(){ result.parentNode.style.height = result.offsetHeight+'px'; }, 0); }); }); false Comment #ffffff true true #ffffff Location true #ffffff TextAndImage #ffffff - true 1x1 true false Labels true 1 false #ffffff false false var='this' digunakan untuk mengirim setiap data allBylineItems agar bisa terbaca Next Page © 2025 All Right Reserved Created By Anas RAR $(document).ready(function() { if (config.fixednavbar) { var navbar = $('.navbar'), placeholder = navbar.parent(); $(window).on('resize load', function(){ navbar.css({position: 'fixed', width: placeholder.outerWidth()+'px', zIndex: '9999999'}); placeholder.css({height: navbar.outerHeight()+'px'}); }); } }); (function(){ function init(){ var anchor = document.querySelector('#loadingbar'); var outSel = (window.config && window.config.output) ? window.config.output : null; var outEl = outSel ? document.querySelector(outSel) : null; if(!anchor && outEl && outEl.parentNode){ var mount = document.createElement('div'); outEl.parentNode.insertBefore(mount, outEl); anchor = mount; } if(!anchor) return; var container = document.createElement('div'); container.className = 'loading-container'; var track = document.createElement('div'); track.className = 'progress-track'; var fill = document.createElement('div'); fill.className = 'progress-fill'; track.appendChild(fill); var text = document.createElement('div'); text.className = 'progress-text'; text.textContent = '5s'; track.appendChild(text); container.appendChild(track); // Below-bar waiting note (XML-safe) var note = document.createElement('div'); note.className = 'loading-note'; note.textContent = 'Waiting...'; container.appendChild(note); anchor.appendChild(container); var btn = document.createElement('button'); btn.type = 'button'; btn.className = 'scroll-btn'; // Avoid inline HTML strings in XML; build icon + text via DOM var icon = document.createElement('i'); icon.className = 'fas fa-arrow-down'; btn.appendChild(icon); btn.appendChild(document.createTextNode(' ' + 'Scroll Down')); btn.style.display = 'none'; anchor.appendChild(btn); var duration = 5000; var start = Date.now(); var timer = setInterval(function(){ var elapsed = Date.now() - start; var pct = Math.min(elapsed / duration * 100, 100); fill.style.width = pct + '%'; var remaining = Math.ceil((duration - elapsed)/1000); text.textContent = (remaining > 0 ? remaining : 0) + 's'; if (elapsed >= duration) { clearInterval(timer); if (container && container.parentNode) container.parentNode.removeChild(container); btn.style.display = 'inline-flex'; } }, 80); btn.addEventListener('click', function(){ // Hide/disable after first click btn.disabled = true; btn.style.display = 'none'; // Show the output action button only now try { if (typeof window.__showOutputActionButton === 'function') { window.__showOutputActionButton(); } } catch(e) {} var ft = document.querySelector('footer.footer'); if (ft && typeof ft.scrollIntoView === 'function') { ft.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'end' }); } else { window.scrollTo({ top: (document.documentElement || document.body).scrollHeight, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }); } if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } })();
